entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 7:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 32 %
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to ice pellets then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
